DateText: late 10th century AH/AD 16th century-early 11th century AH/AD 17th century
Title: Plowing and Selling Produce (Back)
Dimensions: Folio H: 11 1/4 x W: 6 7/8 in. (28.5 x 17.5 cm); Miniature H: 5 9/16 x W: 3 7/16 in. (14.2 x 8.7 cm)
Medium: ink, paint, and gold on paper
Description: This manuscript leaf, Walters W.749, is the back of a folio with an illustration of plowing and selling produce.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Illustration; Miniature; Drawing; Iran
Provenance: Kelekian Estate, 1952, by bequest; Walters Art Museum, 1952, by purchase.
Creator: Style of Attributed to Riza 'Abbasi (Persian, ca. 1565-1635)
